title: Obake no Q-tarou
synopsis: Q-taro, a monster, is living with the Ohara family. He can fly and make his body transparent, but he cannot turn his body into other things like other monsters do. He is a scattered mind, and he always makes mistakes and causes trouble.
staff: [['Nagahama, Tadao', ['Episode Director']], ['Oosumi, Masaaki', ['Episode Director']], ['Ishikawa, Susumu', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Fujiko, Fujio F.', ['Original Creator']]]
